#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail

# spot-diggz ã‚·ãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒˆå–å¾—ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆ
# 1Password CLI (op) ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ .env.tpl ã‹ã‚‰ .env ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã™ã‚‹

SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
PROJECT_ROOT="$(cd "${SCRIPT_DIR}/../.." && pwd)"

# è‰²ä»˜ãå‡ºåŠ›
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[0;33m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

info()  { echo -e "${GREEN}[INFO]${NC} $*"; }
warn()  { echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARN]${NC} $*"; }
error() { echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $*" >&2; }

# op CLI ã®å­˜åœ¨ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
check_op_cli() {
  if ! command -v op &> /dev/null; then
    error "1Password CLI (op) ãŒã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“"
    echo ""
    echo "ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«æ–¹æ³•:"
    echo "  macOS:   brew install --cask 1password-cli"
    echo "  Linux:   https://developer.1password.com/docs/cli/get-started/"
    echo ""
    exit 1
  fi
}

# op CLI ã®èªè¨¼ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
check_op_auth() {
  if ! op account list &> /dev/null 2>&1; then
    error "1Password CLI ãŒæœªèªè¨¼ã§ã™"
    echo ""
    echo "ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¤ãƒ³æ–¹æ³•:"
    echo "  eval \$(op signin)"
    echo ""
    echo "1Password ãƒ‡ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã¨ã®é€£æºã‚’æ¨å¥¨:"
    echo "  1Password > è¨­å®š > é–‹ç™ºè€… > ã€ŒCLI ã¨ãƒ‡ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚’é€£æºã€ã‚’æœ‰åŠ¹åŒ–"
    echo ""
    exit 1
  fi
}

# Vault ã®å­˜åœ¨ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
check_vault() {
  local vault_name="$1"
  if ! op vault get "${vault_name}" &> /dev/null 2>&1; then
    error "Vault '${vault_name}' ãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“"
    echo ""
    echo "Vault ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„:"
    echo "  op vault create '${vault_name}'"
    echo ""
    echo "å¿…è¦ãªã‚¢ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ ã®ä½œæˆæ–¹æ³•ã¯ docs/secrets_management.md ã‚’å‚ç…§ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„"
    exit 1
  fi
}

# .env.tpl ã‹ã‚‰ .env ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆ
inject_env() {
  local tpl_file="$1"
  local out_file="$2"
  local label="$3"

  if [[ ! -f "${tpl_file}" ]]; then
    error "ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“: ${tpl_file}"
    return 1
  fi

  info "${label}: ${tpl_file} â†’ ${out_file}"
  op inject -i "${tpl_file}" -o "${out_file}" --force
  info "${label}: ç”Ÿæˆå®Œäº†"
}

# å‹•çš„ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ã®å–å¾—ãƒ»è¿½è¨˜
inject_dynamic_tokens() {
  local env_file="$1"

  if ! command -v gcloud &> /dev/null; then
    warn "gcloud CLI ãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚SDZ_FIRESTORE_TOKEN / SDZ_STORAGE_SIGNING_TOKEN ã¯æ‰‹å‹•ã§è¨­å®šã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„"
    return 0
  fi

  info "gcloud access token ã‚’å–å¾—ä¸­..."
  local token
  token=$(gcloud auth print-access-token 2>/dev/null) || {
    warn "gcloud auth print-access-token ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚gcloud auth login ã‚’å®Ÿè¡Œã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„"
    return 0
  }

  # sed ã§ REPLACE_BY_SCRIPT ã‚’å®Ÿéš›ã®ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ã«ç½®æ›
  if [[ "$(uname)" == "Darwin" ]]; then
    sed -i '' "s|SDZ_FIRESTORE_TOKEN=REPLACE_BY_SCRIPT|SDZ_FIRESTORE_TOKEN=${token}|" "${env_file}"
    sed -i '' "s|SDZ_STORAGE_SIGNING_TOKEN=REPLACE_BY_SCRIPT|SDZ_STORAGE_SIGNING_TOKEN=${token}|" "${env_file}"
  else
    sed -i "s|SDZ_FIRESTORE_TOKEN=REPLACE_BY_SCRIPT|SDZ_FIRESTORE_TOKEN=${token}|" "${env_file}"
    sed -i "s|SDZ_STORAGE_SIGNING_TOKEN=REPLACE_BY_SCRIPT|SDZ_STORAGE_SIGNING_TOKEN=${token}|" "${env_file}"
  fi
  info "å‹•çš„ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ã‚’ .env ã«æ³¨å…¥ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ"
}

# ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³å‡¦ç†
main() {
  echo "=== spot-diggz ã‚·ãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒˆå–å¾— ==="
  echo ""

  check_op_cli
  check_op_auth
  check_vault "sdz-dev"

  echo ""

  # API ç’°å¢ƒå¤‰æ•°
  inject_env \
    "${PROJECT_ROOT}/web/api/.env.tpl" \
    "${PROJECT_ROOT}/web/api/.env" \
    "API"

  # å‹•çš„ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ã®æ³¨å…¥
  inject_dynamic_tokens "${PROJECT_ROOT}/web/api/.env"

  echo ""

  # UI ç’°å¢ƒå¤‰æ•°
  inject_env \
    "${PROJECT_ROOT}/web/ui/.env.tpl" \
    "${PROJECT_ROOT}/web/ui/.env.local" \
    "UI"

  echo ""
  info "å…¨ã¦ã®ç’°å¢ƒå¤‰æ•°ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã—ã¾ã—ãŸ"
  echo ""
  echo "æ¬¡ã®ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒƒãƒ—:"
  echo "  cd web/api && cargo run      # API ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼èµ·å‹•"
  echo "  cd web/ui && npm run dev     # UI é–‹ç™ºã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼èµ·å‹•"
}

main "$@"

    echo "1Password ãƒ‡ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã¨ã®é€£æºã‚’æ¨å¥¨:"
    echo "  1Password > è¨­å®š > é–‹ç™ºè€… > ã€ŒCLI ã¨ãƒ‡ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚’é€£æºã€ã‚’æœ‰åŠ¹åŒ–"
    echo ""
    exit 1
  fi
}

# Vault ã®å­˜åœ¨ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
check_vault() {
  local vault_name="$1"
  if ! op vault get "${vault_name}" &> /dev/null 2>&1; then
    error "Vault '${vault_name}' ãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“"
    echo ""
    echo "Vault ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„:"
    echo "  op vault create '${vault_name}'"
    echo ""
    echo "å¿…è¦ãªã‚¢ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ ã®ä½œæˆæ–¹æ³•ã¯ docs/secrets_management.md ã‚’å‚ç…§ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„"
    exit 1
  fi
}

# .env.tpl ã‹ã‚‰ .env ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆ
inject_env() {
  local tpl_file="$1"
  local out_file="$2"
  local label="$3"

  if [[ ! -f "${tpl_file}" ]]; then
    error "ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“: ${tpl_file}"
    return 1
  fi

  info "${label}: ${tpl_file} â†’ ${out_file}"
  op inject -i "${tpl_file}" -o "${out_file}" --force
  info "${label}: ç”Ÿæˆå®Œäº†"
}

# å‹•çš„ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ã®å–å¾—ãƒ»è¿½è¨˜
inject_dynamic_tokens() {
  local env_file="$1"

  if ! command -v gcloud &> /dev/null; then
    warn "gcloud CLI ãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚SDZ_FIRESTORE_TOKEN / SDZ_STORAGE_SIGNING_TOKEN ã¯æ‰‹å‹•ã§è¨­å®šã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„"
    return 0
  fi

  info "gcloud access token ã‚’å–å¾—ä¸­..."
  local token
  token=$(gcloud auth print-access-token 2>/dev/null) || {
    warn "gcloud auth print-access-token ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚gcloud auth login ã‚’å®Ÿè¡Œã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„"
    return 0
  }

  # sed ã§ REPLACE_BY_SCRIPT ã‚’å®Ÿéš›ã®ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ã«ç½®æ›
  if [[ "$(uname)" == "Darwin" ]]; then
    sed -i '' "s|SDZ_FIRESTORE_TOKEN=REPLACE_BY_SCRIPT|SDZ_FIRESTORE_TOKEN=${token}|" "${env_file}"
    sed -i '' "s|SDZ_STORAGE_SIGNING_TOKEN=REPLACE_BY_SCRIPT|SDZ_STORAGE_SIGNING_TOKEN=${token}|" "${env_file}"
  else
    sed -i "s|SDZ_FIRESTORE_TOKEN=REPLACE_BY_SCRIPT|SDZ_FIRESTORE_TOKEN=${token}|" "${env_file}"
    sed -i "s|SDZ_STORAGE_SIGNING_TOKEN=REPLACE_BY_SCRIPT|SDZ_STORAGE_SIGNING_TOKEN=${token}|" "${env_file}"
  fi
  info "å‹•çš„ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ã‚’ .env ã«æ³¨å…¥ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ"
}

# ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³å‡¦ç†
main() {
  echo "=== spot-diggz ã‚·ãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒˆå–å¾— ==="
  echo ""

  check_op_cli
  check_op_auth
  check_vault "sdz-dev"

  echo ""

  # API ç’°å¢ƒå¤‰æ•°
  inject_env \
    "${PROJECT_ROOT}/web/api/.env.tpl" \
    "${PROJECT_ROOT}/web/api/.env" \
    "API"

  # å‹•çš„ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ã®æ³¨å…¥
  inject_dynamic_tokens "${PROJECT_ROOT}/web/api/.env"

  echo ""

  # UI ç’°å¢ƒå¤‰æ•°
  inject_env \
    "${PROJECT_ROOT}/web/ui/.env.tpl" \
    "${PROJECT_ROOT}/web/ui/.env.local" \
    "UI"

  echo ""
  info "å…¨ã¦ã®ç’°å¢ƒå¤‰æ•°ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã—ã¾ã—ãŸ"
  echo ""
  echo "æ¬¡ã®ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒƒãƒ—:"
  echo "  cd web/api && cargo run      # API ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼èµ·å‹•"
  echo "  cd web/ui && npm run dev     # UI é–‹ç™ºã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼èµ·å‹•"
}

main "$@"
